recipesJson.name: Strawberried in Stone
recipesJson.author: diy_discord
recipesJson.description:
Red Team's recipe from Mixers Showdown #2 on the DIY_ejuice Discord.

Mixers: @humanpuck, @foment_life, and @gunsforhands 

Sugary sweet peach and strawberry hard candy with a twist. Keeping it simple for Blue teams simple minds.

Come join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/ufVTyAQ
